Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE seguros.v0coberpropva SET NRCERTIF = :NRCERTIF, OCORHIST = :OCORHIST, DTINIVIG = :DTINIVIG, DTTERVIG = :DTTERVIG, IMPSEGUR = :IMPSEGUR, QUANT_VIDAS = :QUANT_VIDAS, IMPSEGIND = :IMPSEGIND, CODOPER = :CODOPER, OPCAO_COBER = :OPCAO_COBER, IMPMORNATU = :IMPMORNATU, IMPMORACID = :IMPMORACID, IMPINVPERM = :IMPINVPERM, IMPAMDS = :IMPAMDS, IMPDH = :IMPDH, IMPDIT = :IMPDIT, VLPREMIO = :VLPREMIO, PRMVG = :PRMVG, PRMAP = :PRMAP, QTTITCAP = :QTTITCAP, VLTITCAP = :VLTITCAP, VLCUSTCAP = :VLCUSTCAP, IMPSEGCDC = :IMPSEGCDC, VLCUSTCDG = :VLCUSTCDG, CODUSU = :CODUSU, TIMESTAMP = CURRENT TIMESTAMP, IMPSEGAUXF = :IMPSEGAUXF, VLCUSTAUXF = :VLCUSTAUXF, PRMDIT = :PRMDIT, QTDIT = :QTDIT WHERE nrcertif = :NRCERTIF AND ocorhist = 1 END SQL
